titleStmt.title: The suppressing of the assembly of the pretended shee-Iesuites. By the edict of our most holy father and lord, Vrbanus, Dei gratia. The eight (of that name) now Pope of Rome. Translated out of the Low-dutch coppie, printed at Bruxells
titleStmt.author: Urban VIII, Pope, 1568-1644.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by J. Dawson?] for Nathaniell Butter, and Nicholas Bourne,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
